segments.text: Hey Jimmy . Let's go workout later today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What time do you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Today we work on Legs and forearm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey . I just played basketball earlier , so my legs are a little sore . Let's work out on arms and stomach today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm on a weekly schedule . You're messing everything up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: C'mon . We're only switching two days . You can do legs on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aright . I'll meet you at the gym at 3:30 then .
segments.speaker: S2
